title: How big is Starfield, anyway?
description: Todd Howard has given us some hints, but a lot remains shrouded in mystery.

title: Bungie warns Destiny 2 cheat makers: Your days of operating 'without fear of consequences are over'
description: The Destiny 2 studio has filed a new lawsuit against the makers of the Ring-1 cheat.

title: Diablo 4's next patch ignores what Sorcerers and Barbarians needed most and targets their weakest builds instead
description: Patch 1.1.1 buffs build variety for both classes.

title: The Callisto Protocol studio lays off 32 employees
description: Parent company Krafton has confirmed the cuts.

title: The Witcher producer blames Americans and impatient young people for the Netflix show's simplified plot
description: Die-hard Witcher fans aren't happy with a lot of the changes Netflix has made to Andrzej Sapkowski's stories.

title: Time Bandit is an anti-capitalist satirical work sim where all the drudgery takes real-life days and hours, and I can't wait for part 2
description: Take your time.

title: Combat-free MMO Palia is giving me high hopes for the future of 'cozy' MMOs
description: Palia is headed into an open beta next week for all life sim lovers to try.

title: Skanky old DDR4 server chips reportedly sold in new RAM kits but really don't panic
description: Anything faster than DDR4-3200 is OK.

title: MrBeast Burger says MrBeast's a no-good bully who's 'elevated greed over his word and the truth', and it'll see him in court
description: Delicious drama, though apparently the same can't be said of the food.

title: MOZA Racing hardware is shaking up the PC sim racing scene
description: From Direct Drive racing wheels to dashboards, MOZA's products cut no corners on quality.

title: Modern Warfare 2 now canonically features an indestructible dog named Merlin who lives on your belt
description: This dog is bullet proof.

title: This completely submersible RTX 4090 PC is slightly silly but totally awesome
description: We all live in a mellow garden pond.

title: 9 things you should know about the city of Baldur's Gate before you start Baldur's Gate 3
description: The iconic city has a long history on the tabletop and in videogames, and it's full of secrets.

title: Remnant 2 devs revealed a secret class only datamining could uncover, only for a guy with no coding experience to find it in less than a week with AI and 15 cans of Red Bull
description: Welcome to the backrooms.

description: "It's pure comedic gold."

description: It's just science.

title: Street Fighter 6 tournament accidentally broadcasts Chun Li nude mod to the world
description: "Never borrow this guy's stick."

title: It looks like D&D 5th edition's worst subclass will be saved by Baldur's Gate 3
description: Justice for Monks.

title: RX 7900 XTX finally appears in new Steam hardware survey but AMD's overall market share is still horrible
description: Less than 10% of Steam gamers polled use an AMD graphics card.

title: Post Malone succumbs to the lure of power, purchases one-of-a-kind Ring of Sauron Magic: The Gathering card valued at $2 million
description: "When I found the One Ring, the first person who came to mind was Post Malone".

title: Sony and Microsoft really are propping up AMD's beleaguered GPU business right now
description: It's only the console chips keeping AMD's gaming market afloat while GPU sales continue to suffer.

title: AMD confirms imminent launch of 'new enthusiast-class Radeon 7000-series cards'
description: Looks like the RX 7800 and RX 7700 are very much on track for release in the next few months.

title: Surviving the Cannibal curse: One  developer's fraught journey to create a videogame sequel to the most controversial movie ever made
description: Fantastico Studio dreams of making a sequel to iconic ultraviolent 80s splatterfest Cannibal Holocaust—but it's encountering its own horrors along the way.

title: That 4K 32-inch OLED gaming monitor you've been waiting for will finally arrive in summer 2024
description: Both Samsung and LG getting in on the 4K OLED game.

description: Today's Wordle: Help with the #774 puzzle.

title: I'll be a sweaty little D&D powergamer in Baldur's Gate 3 and you can't stop me
description: To min-max or not to min-max RPG? It's not even a question for me.
